x_nuvo_diag_probes.description: World View in End User Application does not work in the Romania release.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: World View Not Loading
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation:
x_nuvo_eam.td_map_tile_provider Value should be pointing to tile provider's api URL (System Properties)
x_nuvo_eam_np_world_view_permitted Value should be set to true (Space Management)
or Check for punctuation marks (apostrophes) in Space records' Address fields
Location records' Description field containing /n /r charsets.

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_cf0fa3a21bb2a91088b2777e0a4bcb67
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>World View in End User Application does not work in the Romania release.</description><healthcheck_type/><name>World View Not Loading</name><order/><probe_type/><product_version/><remediation>x_nuvo_eam.td_map_tile_provider
 Value should be pointing to tile provider's api URL (System Properties)

x_nuvo_eam_np_world_view_permitted
 Value should be set to true (Space Management)

or 
Check for punctuation marks (apostrophes) in Space records' Address fields

Location records' Description field containing /n /r charsets. </remediation><script><![CDATA[var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();

var version = new GlideRecord('sys_scope');
version.addQuery('name', 'Connected Workplace');
version.query();
if (version.next()) {
    if (version.version.split('.')[0] == '19') {
        var sys_gr = new GlideRecord('sys_properties');
        sys_gr.addQuery('name', 'x_nuvo_eam.td_map_tile_provider');
        sys_gr.query();
        sys_gr.next(); // record for the map_tile_provider property: String Value
        var prop_gr = new GlideRecord('x_nuvo_mobile_nuvolo_property');
        prop_gr.addQuery('name', 'x_nuvo_eam_np_world_view_permitted');
        prop_gr.query();
        prop_gr.next(); // record for the world_view_permitted property: True/False Value
        if (sys_gr.value != '' && prop_gr.value) {
            var space_gr = new GlideRecord('x_nuvo_eam_space'); // all space records
            space_gr.addActiveQuery();
            space_gr.query();
            var count = 0;
            while (space_gr.next()) {
                if (space_gr.name.toString().includes("'") || space_gr.name.toString().includes("/")) { // if the name contains an (') inciment count
                    count++;
                } else if (space_gr.description.toString().includes("/")) { // if the description contains an (/) inciment count
                    count++;
                } else if (space_gr.display_name.toString().includes("'") || space_gr.display_name.toString().includes("/")) {
                    count++;
                }
            }
			//var output = 'There are ' + count + ' records in the space table which contain improper values, please ensure that no records has an \' in the name or a / charecter in the discription.';
			//util.handleOutput(output, 'Information', 'AK TEST probe category');
            if (count > 0) {
				output = 'There are ' + count + ' records in the space table which contain improper values, please ensure that no records has an \' in the name or a / charecter in the discription.';
                util.handleOutput(output, 'Information', 'Space');
            }
        }
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>michael.peck@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-05-17 16:51:17</sys_created_on><sys_id>cf0fa3a21bb2a91088b2777e0a4bcb67</sys_id><sys_mod_count>32</sys_mod_count><sys_name>World View Not Loading</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_cf0fa3a21bb2a91088b2777e0a4bcb67</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-17 11:21:26</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
